title: Google pixel2 camera problem
content:
I contacted google pixel2 for my camera issue, they said would replace the phone due to hardware issue, but the support says they have escalated the issue and now its 2 weeks and there is nobody helping and any progress.  I am just getting an auto response every time saying we have escalated the issue. does it take two weeks for the escalated issue?
I am tired of running around and camera issue.
